Package android.nfc

Interface NfcAdapter.ControllerAlwaysOnListener

  • Enclosing class:
    NfcAdapter
    public static interface NfcAdapter.ControllerAlwaysOnListener
    A listener to be invoked when NFC controller always on state changes.

    Register your ControllerAlwaysOnListener implementation with NfcAdapter.registerControllerAlwaysOnListener(java.util.concurrent.Executor, android.nfc.NfcAdapter.ControllerAlwaysOnListener) and disable it with NfcAdapter.unregisterControllerAlwaysOnListener(android.nfc.NfcAdapter.ControllerAlwaysOnListener).

    See Also:
    NfcAdapter.registerControllerAlwaysOnListener(java.util.concurrent.Executor, android.nfc.NfcAdapter.ControllerAlwaysOnListener)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onControllerAlwaysOnChanged​(boolean isEnabled)
      Called on NFC controller always on state changes

    • Method Detail

      • onControllerAlwaysOnChanged
